scripts.build:cloudflare: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y && . "$HOME/.cargo/env" && cargo install wasm-pack && env > app/.env && yarn build:all
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf ./target & rm -rf ./test-ledger & yarn --cwd app clean & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin clean & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/bonds clean & find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.clean:ts: yarn --cwd app clean & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin clean & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/bonds clean & find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.dev: yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin watch & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/bonds watch & yarn --cwd app dev
scripts.docs:rust: cargo doc -p jet-margin -p jet-margin-pool -p jet-margin-swap -p jet-bonds --no-deps && cp -r ./target/doc/* ./docs/margin-rust
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint && git add .
